welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Douglass, a charming city known for its friendly locals and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wings Field Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Wings Field Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lehigh Valley International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lehigh Valley International Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Doylestown Airport offers a small but comfortable waiting area for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Doylestown Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for its passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary wifi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated for cargo operations at Willow Grove NAS Airport.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chestercounty Carlson Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Chestercounty Carlson Airport is responsible for the transportation of goods and packages.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
